description: Nodes in riff (rooted index-functional forest) for n.
comments: A061396(n) gives number of times n appears in this sequence.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
J. Awbrey, Illustrations of riffs for small integers
formula: a(Prod(p_i^e_i)) = Sum(a(i)+a(e_i)+1), product over nonzero e_i in prime factorization.a(n) = sum(a(A049084(A027748(n,k)))+a(A124010(n,k))+1: k=1..A001221(n)). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 26 2013
prog: (Haskell)import Data.Function (on)a062537 1 = 0a062537 n = sum $ map (+ 1) $   zipWith ((+) `on` a062537) (map a049084 $ a027748_row n) (a124010_row n)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 26 2013
author: _David W. Wilson_, Jun 25 2001
